io.github.pulsebeat02.minecraftmedialibrary.extractor

Interface VideoExtractor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    YoutubeExtraction

    public interface VideoExtractor
    A useful interface that is used to specify custom video extraction classes. Used within the library as well.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      @NotNull java.nio.file.Path downloadVideo()
      Downloads the specified video given the url.
      @NotNull java.nio.file.Path extractAudio()
      Extracts audio from the video just downloaded.
      void onAudioExtraction()
      This method is called at the beginning of audio extraction.
      void onVideoDownload()
      This method is called at the beginning of video download.

    • Method Detail

      • downloadVideo

        @NotNull
@NotNull java.nio.file.Path downloadVideo()
        Downloads the specified video given the url. If the video is a Youtube URL and the video id could not be extracted, it will throw an InvalidYoutubeURLException.
        Returns:
        the downloaded video

      • extractAudio

        @NotNull
@NotNull java.nio.file.Path extractAudio()
        Extracts audio from the video just downloaded. If the video was not downloaded, it will prompt to call the downloadVideo() method first and then extract it. By default, this will return an ogg file.
        Returns:
        the extracted audio

      • onVideoDownload

        void onVideoDownload()
        This method is called at the beginning of video download. Useful for preparation in advance of the video download.

      • onAudioExtraction

        void onAudioExtraction()
        This method is called at the beginning of audio extraction. Useful for preparation in advance of audio extraction.
